description: As users work on their tax return in TurboTax Canada 2022, they can save their progress as a TT22 file before submitting it electronically or by mail. Users may also save tax returns as TT22 files to store on their computer or storage device as backups to prevent data loss and import into TurboTax Canada 2023 to prefill the next year's return.
NOTE: TurboTax Canada assigns file extensions based on the tax year, with .TT20 used for 2020 returns and .TT21 for 2021.
